name: places/ChIJe58sv6BZwokRHWrLd2J0ECc
formattedAddress: 139 E 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 139 E 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: I can only say I am truly disappointed. I paid for a special back on June 10th, 2022, almost 10 months ago.  My schedule and time is equally valuable and when I make commitments I make sure to keep them as I don’t want to disappoint people. I have waited a very long time to get a simple reading from Thomas and even had an appointment that was cancelled and rescheduled for this week and now two days before I get a notice that Thomas has overcommitted himself and is going to refund my money. Finding a short amount of time to satisfy paying customers would be my first commitment but I am sure big venues and higher paying customers are more lucrative for Thomas than a simple reading.  I will continue to search for a psychic that cares about his customer because it’s obvious that  Thomas only cares about fame and notoriety This was an easy way out for Thomas to just say I can refund your money instead of trying to find time in the future for my session.  I waited ten months for a reading with one cancelled appointment in that time what would be waiting another couple of months to get the reading. My suggestion to Thomas is don’t do specials if he’s so busy.  Don’t entice people to get their hopes up only to let them down.  Your only as good as you are to your paying customer and this speaks volume

originalText.text:
Thomas is simply the best!!  I've taken several online classes with him, and had two private phone readings.  He brought through several loved ones who are in spirit with amazing accuracy and compassion, and delivered so many comforting and healing messages to me!  He also absolutely provided evidential details that no one could know but me.  I've witnessed him deliver amazing messages to my friends in larger group readings as well.  He also  donates time to Helping Parents Heal, a wonderful support group for bereaved parents.

Thomas is extremely caring, kind, professional, and easy to talk to.  He is doing so much good in this world to help others by sharing his amazing gift!  The healing and comfort that comes from being able to connect with a precious loved one in spirit is a blessing beyond compare, especially for those of us with a child in spirit.  I recommend him highly!  Thank you so much, Thomas!!

originalText.text: Thomas is a born healer.  He is gentle and kind.  His energy was calming, as I went into the session with some anxiety due to a life transition.  Thomas was amazing with names and dates, and offered his intuitive knowing in exactly the areas of my life that made sense.  I left the session with crystal clarity in my direction.  Amazing!  I will definitely call on him again.  Thank you Thomas!

originalText.text: A recent reading with Thomas was very on point. He mentioned items to me that no one would know about except myself. Information received from loved ones who have passed was wonderful and filled me with warmth. I also received information about my best friend's father who has passed, which was so like him to "join in." I will do future readings with Thomas because I received so much in return.

text.text: A recent reading with Thomas was very on point. He mentioned items to me that no one would know about except myself. Information received from loved ones who have passed was wonderful and filled me with warmth. I also received information about my best friend's father who has passed, which was so like him to "join in." I will do future readings with Thomas because I received so much in return.

originalText.text: Please pass along to Thomas what a life changing spirit circle we had.  My 15 year old son unexpectedly passed away almost 6 months ago and it obviously has been incredibly difficult to move forward each day.  I woke up this morning with a renewed sense of peace, that I honestly thought I would never feel again.  I hope Thomas knows what a positive impact his gift had on myself and my entire family.  We will forever be grateful for meeting him, and I look forward to having another reading in the future.
